name: drink-code
description: Stay on top of your hydration game while you code! \"Drink Code\" helps developers maintain their health by sending gentle reminders to drink water during coding sessions.

drink-code.drinkInterval.description: Interval in milliseconds to remind you to drink water

drink-code.drinkSkipFactor.description: Factor to skip the next reminder (e.g. 2 means the interval will be halved every time you skip)

drink-code.drinkReminderTimeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds to dismiss the reminder

drink-code.drinkMinInterval.description: Minimum interval in milliseconds to remind you to drink water (used for decreasing the interval)

drink-code.drinkStates.description: States to remind you to drink water

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
